text: I told you the stool was about to go over. And in a moment there's going to be real chaos, which will make what's going on in the picture look like nothing. The cookie jar is full, the lid is off the cookie jar. Do you want me to tell you all those things? Tell me all the things you see going on in the picture. The cabinet door has just swung open, the stool's about to fall, I guess I've told you that with the terrible crash. Mother is daydreaming, she doesn't even know what's going on behind her, I think that's very important.
